security: Request to involve Canadian intelligence (SMABOVES) in a joint debriefing with KUBARK, showing operational coordination. Mentioning the asset's willingness to participate in KUBARK debriefings over the past two years highlights ongoing intelligence activities.
summary: A message from the Director to Ottawa requests the assistance of Canadian intelligence (SMABOVES) in arranging a joint debriefing of CASUGAR/1, who has high-level access to PBRUMEN target personalities, to obtain their views on the current PBRUMEN political shakeup.
summary_one_paragraph: This message, dated March 23, 1966, is from the Director to Ottawa, regarding CASUGAR/1, who has high-level access to PBRUMEN target personalities; the message requests that Ottawa intercede with SMABOVES to arrange a joint debriefing with KUBARK in Canada to get CASUGAR/1's views on the current PBRUMEN political situation. Headquarters is prepared to send a TYPIC officer and notes that CASUGAR/1 is a willing participant who has been debriefed by KUBARK in the past two years.
title: CASUGAR Debriefing Request
